content_1: Bangladesh. Bird flu has been detected in a poultry farm in the village of Rampur in Netrakona District.  The district Livestock Office said that dozens of birds that died over the last week have tested positive. Officials culled 1,595 chickens and 205 eggs. India. New outbreaks of bird flu are occurring in the Darjeeling District of West Bengal one month after officials announced that the outbreak was contained. West Bengal officials began the process of culling about 11,000 birds. Indonesia. The Ngawi Husbandry Agency of East Java reported that 30 chickens in Ngawi died of bird flu. A two-year-old child is in the hospital following contact with some of the chickens, avian influenza is suspected.
